issue.title: SA camera frames wrong on v4 and v5 models

content.raw:
Yes.

The new values are:

r_situational_awareness_camera_link

<origin xyz="0.155 -0.121 0.785" rpy="0 0 -1.309">

l_situational_awareness_camera_link

<origin xyz="0.155 0.121 0.785" rpy="0 0 1.309">

There is no longer a rear situational camera and that should be removed from the v4 and v5 urdfs

Finally, I do not understand what the "optical frame joints" are?  Do you?  I cannot even begin to fathom their purpose.  Maybe those should be removed too?  They seem to be just a roll and yaw of the camera joints.

Could you do me the favor of making the above changes to the v4 and v5 urdfs?  I am pushing to get the physical robots shipped back to the performers.  Feel free to say no and I'll make a formal commit to bitbucket.
